raw_text:
Based on the provided paper content, I'll extract the structured information following the guidelines:

```json
{
  "paper_metadata": {
    "title": "Farmers' cooperatives and multi-dimensional poverty reduction in deep poverty-stricken areas in China",
    "matches_expected_title": "YES"
  },
  "program_information": {
    "program_name": "Farmers' cooperatives program",
    "country": "China",
    "region": "Sichuan, Yunnan and Jiangxi Provinces and Chongqing City",
    "target_population": "Small farmers in poverty-stricken areas"
  },
  "intervention_components": {
    "component_a_cash_support": {
      "component_a_present": false,
      "cash_support_type": null,
      "cash_amount": null,
      "cash_frequency": null,
      "is_loan_or_credit": "NO",
      "cash_evidence_citation": null
    },
    "component_b_assets": {
      "component_b_present": false,
      "assets_provided": [],
      "direct_provision": "UNCLEAR",
      "assets_evidence_citation": null
    }
  },
  "study_characteristics": {
    "outcomes_measured": [
      "financing",
      "technology application",
      "market sales",
      "rights decision-making",
      "material poverty",
      "ability poverty",
      "rights poverty"
    ],
    "outcomes_evidence_citation": "farmers' cooperatives play an important role in enhancing small farmers' financing, technology application, market sales, and rights decision-making",
    "study_design": "Instrumental variables",
    "design_evidence_citation": "this paper uses the multi-dimensional poverty measurement method and the instrumental variable method",
    "is_review_or_policy_analysis": false,
    "publication_year": null,
    "study_conducted_year": "2015-2016",
    "sample_size": 7200,
    "completed": true
  },
  "bonus_information": {
    "has_qualitative_components": false,
    "qualitative_methods": [],
    "qualitative_evidence_citation": null,
    "has_cost_data": false,
    "cost_mentions": null,
    "cost_evidence_citation": null
  },
  "evidence_citations": {
    "program_name_citation": "Farmers' cooperatives play an important role in enabling small farmers to integrate into modern agriculture",
    "country_citation": "Based on the survey data of 7200 farmers in four provinces of China",
    "target_population_citation": "Based on the survey data of 7200 farmers in four provinces of China, this paper uses the multi-dimensional poverty measurement method and the instrumental variable method to reveal the transmission mechanism and multi-dimensional poverty reduction effect of farmers' cooperatives in deep poverty-stricken areas in China"
  }
}
```

Note: This paper appears to be studying farmers' cooperatives but does not describe a graduation program or direct cash/asset transfer intervention. While it examines poverty reduction through cooperative membership, it doesn't meet the criteria for Components A (cash support) or B (asset provision) as defined in the guidelines.
